title: this is fake right
body: stupid motherfukers trying to get my acc info

replies.body: If the site is anything but ...leagueoflegends.com/... than it is fake.

Hey lordofrage,

Any promotions that Riot is running will be announced on the League of Legends website or listed on the [**Free Swag**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-) article. Any promotions besides those that aren't linked to the League of Legends website, so http://leagueoflegends.com/ or http://riotgames.com, are almost definitely fake. Be wary of clicking these links, as some of these websites are malicious in nature. For additional advice on keeping your account secure, check out the [**Protecting Your Account**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) Riot Games Support article! 

Please remove your link so that no one mistakenly clicks on the link and finds themselves in some trouble. Thanks!
